start.text: AIS picking up hostile fleet. Lets move in.
My crew have manned their posts.
Reactor output is optimal. Ballistics magazines are filled.
♪What do we have that they don't have?~♪

start_boss.text: In all my years, I've never been in a fight like this.

retreat.text: Getting out of here is for the best.
It's a shame we can't finish this.

need_help.text: Gunnery crews are overwhelmed. Send reinforcements!
I'm being overrun here. Requesting support.

pursuing.text: Trying to slip by? Focus fire!
You won't get away this time.

running.text: I'm getting out of here before I take a shot too many.

hull_90.text: Damage reports are starting to come in.
Now now. You'll have to try harder than that to break an officer of the $officerFaction.
Some poor cadet is getting a trial by fire today.

hull_50.text: Damage is starting to mount. $playerHonorific, got a plan?
Engineering is getting overwhelmed. Hull reporting 50% integrity
Route damage control to that last impact - and get me the engine room!

hull_30.text: $playerHonorific, we need to pull out of the battle *now*.
My hull is starting to fracture. Crew causalties are mounting.

overload.text: Vent that flux build-up! We can't have them shredding us!

death.text: Explosions are rippling through the corridors! Get to the pods!

victory_boss.text: That's a battle for my memoir.
